cleaned_text: Black Cohosh Root Herbal Supplement Liquid1.0Ounce How would you like to receive this item ? Description - Supports women's health issues - The ultimate in convenience - Promotes Hormonal Balance - Supports women's health issues throughout life - 1:1 extract delivers 100 milligrams - Tastes great and alcohol free This Native American herb, also known as black snakeroot and bugbane, has been a traditional favorite for feminine health issues for centuries. This liquid extract works faster and more completely than other forms of supplementation. There are no pills to swallow, no herbs to press, or tea to steep. Plus, liquid nutrients are absorbed quickly, so they get to work right away. What's more, liquid extracts preserve active constituents and have a very long shelf life. They are also the ultimate in convenience - just add them to water, tea, or juice and enjoy a tasty, nutritious boost at home, work, or on-the-go. This Black Cohosh Root liquid extract is packaged in a brown, light-resistant bottle with easy-to-use dropper. Any Questions? 1-800-644-8327 *These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.Suggested Use: As a dietary supplement, take 1 mL two times daily, in a small amount of water. © 2011 Indiana Botanic Gardens, Inc.
